titleStmt.title: SII 6.57: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 57. (A.R. No. 103 of 1897). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamaḷ nilava malarmakaḷ puṇara Urimaiyil ciṟan=ta maṇimuṭi cūṭi minavar nilaikeṭa villavar kulaitara Eṉaimannava ririyaluṟ ṟiḻitara tikkaṉaittu n=tan cakkara naṭātti vīrasiṁhāsana t=tulakuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟirun=taruḷiya kovirājakesarivanmarāna tribhuvanacakravart=tikaḷ śrīkulot=tuṅkacoḻa
devarkki yāṇṭu 4 10 8Āvatu makaranāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣat=tu trayodaśiyum tiṅkaṭkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa tiruvātirai nāḷ cut=tamalivaḷanāṭṭu brahmadeyam taṉiyūr śrīrājādhirājaccaturvvetimaṅkalat=tu naṭuvil tirumuṟṟamāna śrīkulottuṅkacoḻaviṇṇakarāḻvār koyilil munpil māvinkiḻey dharmmiyūti peruṅkuṟi koṭṭik kūṭṭaṅkuṟaivaṟak kūṭiyiruntu mahāsabhai
yār sabhāvyavasthai paṇṇinapaṭi kāṭum nāṭum nakaraṅkaḷum kaḷḷappaṟṟu makappaṭa muppatināyiraṅ kācukku māvīn=tu Iṟukkak kaṭavomākavum māvīyumiṭat=tu Ampalattile peruṅkuṟi koṭṭik kūṭṭaṅ kuṟaivaṟak kūṭik koyiṟṟamaroṭuṅ kūṭi Irun=tu maṭakku māvile māvīyakkaṭavomākavum māvīnta kāciṟukkumiṭattu Olaikaḷālum koyiṟṟamarkkuc colaittāṅkalālum Oḻiyak
kuṇṭikaiyile yiṭṭuk kaiccāt=tuk koḷḷak kaṭavomākavum māvīn=ta kāciṟukkumiṭat=tu nāḷopāti kācelalo mokka Iṟukkakkaṭavomākavum kār pacāṉam mukkācum taim māsamakappaṭa nerāka Iṟukkakkaṭavomākavum Orupūkkācum pacānakkācum Āṇṭācaṟutiyāka nerāka Iṟukkakkaṭavomākavum Ippari ciṟātārai Iraṭṭi Iṟuppikkak kaṭavomākavum kuṭimakanai Iṟaik kūlikoṇṭānai nā
koṇṭavastuvukku vanukku tiriyakkuṭuppittu rājadaṇḍamāka Ivvastu vukkumāka maṭaṅku daṇḍamākakkoḷḷakkaṭavomākavum veḷḷāṉ veṭṭi koḷḷaviṭṭu veḷḷānum maṭakkile kurampaṭaintu veṭṭikkoḷḷakakaṭavomākavum brāhmaṇaraiyum veḷḷāraiyum vārakkuṭimai tavirakkaṭavomākavum koyiṟṟamaraikkāṇumiṭattu pan=tumun llatu kāṇakkaṭvomal
vum kaṇṭāl kūṭappuṟappaṭṭu ṭavomākavum llatu yvār tiruvāṇai Ulakuṭaiyār kaṭavomākavum
yum paṇiyāl paṭṭarpaṇiyālum muṭaiyān paṭṭāpaṇiyālum m paṭṭarpaṇiyālum
paṇiyālum kiḻakkucceri bhaṭṭar paṇiyālum lokamātevicceri ṭṭar paṇiyālum pāṇṭi bhaṭṭar paṇiyālum kūṭṭakkaṇakku nāṇalūruṭaiyān Eḻuttu
Lines 6 to 8 are very badly damaged.
Digital edition of SII 6.57 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
